name: video-meeting-minutes-frontend
description: Micro frontend application for video-to-meeting-minutes system

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shell && npm run install:modules
scripts.install:modules: cd modules/video-processing && npm install && cd ../transcription && npm install && cd ../meeting-minutes && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:video" "npm run dev:transcription" "npm run dev:meeting"
scripts.build: npm run build:shell && npm run build:modules
scripts.build:modules: cd modules/video-processing && npm run build && cd ../transcription && npm run build && cd ../meeting-minutes && npm run build && cd ../shared && npm run build
